note.p: Death: At his residence in Harcourt Street, Dublin, Ireland (08 May 1790)
Burial: Chapel of Trinity College, Dublin
Education: BA (1761) MA (1764) BD and DD (1779) Trinity College, Dubin
Career: Andrews' Professor of Astronomy (1783); established observatory at Dunsink, County Dublin
Notes: At head of election certificate: Compounded
